resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81265</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81265</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9753</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Myself – Interactive Questioning</string>
            <string language="es">Yo mismo – Cuestionario interactivo</string>
            <string language="ga">Mé Féin  - Ceistiúchán Idirghníomhach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Selbst? Interaktives Ausfragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moi-même ? Interrogation Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu mesmo? Questionar Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Io stesso? Interrogazione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ίδιος; Διαλογική επερώτηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupil will revise the theme of Myself. Written questions will be used to assess the understanding of the pupil. The pupil will be able to correct themselves. The pupil will use interactive resources to encourage reading.</string>
            <string language="es">El alumno revisará el tema de yo mismo. Se utilizarán preguntas escritas para evaluar la comprensión del alumno. Los alumnos podrán corregirse a sí mismos. El alumno utilizará recursos interactivos que le estimulen a leer.</string>
            <string language="ga">Déanfaidh an páiste dul siar ar an téama, Mé Féin. Beidh úsáid á dhéanamh as ceisteanna scríofa chun tuiscint an pháiste a mheasúnú. Beidh ar chumas an pháiste féincheartú a dhéanamh. Bainfidh an páiste úsáid as acmhainn idirghníomhach chun an léitheoireacht a chothú. Beidh deis ag an bpáiste léitheoireacht feidhmiúil a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupille verbessert das Thema von mich. 
Schriftliche Fragen werden verwendet, um das Verständnis der 
Pupille festzusetzen. Die Pupille kann, sich zu beheben. 
Die Pupille benutzt interaktive Betriebsmittel, um Messwert 
anzuregen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pupille mettra à jour le thème de me. 
Des questions écrites seront employées pour évaluer 
l'arrangement de la pupille. La pupille pourra se corriger. 
La pupille emploiera les ressources interactives pour encourager
la lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pupila revisará o tema de myself. As 
perguntas escritas serão usadas avaliar a compreensão da pupila. 
A pupila poderá  corrigir-se. A pupila usará recursos 
interativos incentivar a leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pupilla gli modificherà il tema. Le 
domande scritte saranno usate per valutare la comprensione della 
pupilla. La pupilla potrà correggersi. La pupilla userà 
le risorse interattive per consigliare alla lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαθητής θα αναθεωρήσει το θέμα μου. Οι γραπτές
ερωτήσεις θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για να αξιολογήσουν την κατανόηση του
μαθητή. Ο μαθητής θα είναι σε θέση να διορθωθεί. Ο 
μαθητής θα χρησιμοποιήσει τα διαλογικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για 
να ενθαρρύνει την ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
